title: CUDA documentation enhancement
body_html:
Adds documentation that would have been helpful for me as I tried to navigate how to do multi-GPU training for the first time. Since I'm still learning the library, I'm not certain that the text I've added is correct! Please let me know if it could be improved and I'll incorporate the changes.

Also has some smaller tweaks for formatting issues, etc. that I noticed.
